title: I think I can fix the RTX 4090 - Undervolting for big gains!

SmartDeploy: Claim your FREE IT software (worth $580!) at   Nvidia's RTX 4090 is the new king of GPUs. It laughs at last generation ray tracing performance, it shrugs off the most demanding of games, it... recommends a power supply with 850 to 1000 watts?! There's got to be a better way - and it starts with undervolting.
